#### Connection to Research
 This unit connects to authentic engineering thinking. In Lesson 2, the Choose-Your-Own STEM Adventure blended chemistry lab, students will think through and discuss water purification strategies with classmates. They will interact with a web app that tracks the environmental and monetary costs of their decisions as they perform hands-on labs to assess and filter out impurities in water samples.
